item.title: IC snag draw against UCL before teeing up
item.author: Felix Editor,Alex Clayton,
item.description: The 9th of November saw the rugby 1st XV arrive at their ever windy fortress Harlington to face UCL. After a brief hiatus during the warm-up, the team were out for a few minutes before heading back into the changing room to slide on their ‘mysteriously moist’ playing shirts. At kick off, IC came out …
